about_the_game:
In Beyond the Struggle, players will face various challenges that are common in modern life. Use your strategic thinking to manage stress, overcome obstacles, and rise to life's challenges.

Building Strategy Cards�
Drag recipe cards to the table, add resources, and craft strategy cards. These cards represent your inner strategies, helping you manage resources and challenges.

Build carefully to shape your path.

Resource Management�
Strategy cards generate action points and emotional energy, while challenges reward knowledge reserves.

Balance building and overcoming challenges to thrive.

Handling Challenge Cards�
Challenge cards reflect the struggles you face in life. Resolve them within the time limit to avoid increased pressure or new setbacks.

Adapt, persist, and rise above!

Key Features

Strategic Card Building: Create and customize your card deck to face different life challenges, from stress at work to personal dilemmas, and find the best strategies to manage them.

Real-Life Simulation: From managing your career to nurturing relationships and taking care of your health, the game immerses you in the ups and downs of real life, testing your ability to juggle multiple aspects of personal well-being.

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM

  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound card

short_description: A strategic life-simulation game where your choices shape your ability to adapt. Play strategy cards like Meditate to reduce stress or Self-Learn to prepare for challenges. Manage resources, tackle obstacles, and face unexpected twists. Will you rise beyond the struggle or succumb to the pressure?
